title: Youkai Watch: Wakuwaku☆Nyanderful Days
original_name: 妖怪ウォッチ～わくわく ☆ にゃんだふるデイズ～
sinopse: A young girl is browsing an antique shop when she comes across some youkai. At first scared of them, she eventually comes to befriend them and they give her a device called a "Youkai Watch," which grants her the power to see and befriend other youkai.
